context.p: The battery of your electric car doesn't require maintenance but there are a few tips that you can do to maintain its capacity and increase its lifespan.

step.cmd: Invest in an efficient charging station.
Maintain the ideal state of charge between 40-80%.
Do not to leave the car parked in direct sunlight for long periods of the day, when the temperatures are very high.
Limit the amount of DC fast charge sessions, especially in hot conditions.
